description: Focused study on an instrument forms the central pillar for the BMus Majors in piano, strings, brass, wind and percussion. Normally undertaken in the fourth year of study, this module forms the capstone for instrumental Majors on the BMus programme. The module continues and consolidates processes initiated in previous semesters, manifesting their outcome in the form of a recital of approximately one hour’s duration, demonstrating the emerging artistic and professional identity of each student.
title: Senior Recital - Instrumental Performance Capstone
